tool_description: The NBA Statistics API provides access to various statistics related to NBA players, teams, and games. Users can retrieve data such as player scoring, assists, rebounds, and shot charts for specific seasons and playoffs.

api_list.name: topScorersBySeasonTotalPoints
api_list.description: Returns the top players by total points in descending order for a specified season.

api_list.name: topAssistsInThePlayoffsBySeasonTotalAssists
api_list.description: Returns the top 20 players by assists during the playoffs for a specified season.

api_list.name: topAssistsBySeasonTotalAssists
api_list.description: Returns the top 20 players by assists in descending order for a specified season.

api_list.name: playerSeasonStatsByName
api_list.description: Retrieves season statistics for a specified player by name.

api_list.name: allPlayersBySeason
api_list.description: Returns statistics for all players in a specified season.

api_list.name: playerShotChartDataSeasonPlayoffs
api_list.description: Returns shot chart data for a specified player during the season and playoffs.
